root.name: Street Hockey '95
root.description: OverviewStreet Hockey '95 is a hockey game developed and published by GTE Entertainment for the Super Nintendo platform.GameplayStreet Hockey '95 is a street hockey game that is played three on three with two players on the field and one as the goalie. There are nine playable characters that can be selected to be on the players team.Game ModesThere are seven different game types that can be played:PracticeTournamentFat PointRushWhackCrammitHot Puck
